Title: Biomarkers of Lung Injury in Hyperinflation in the Mechanical Ventilator Versus Manual Hyperinflation
Interventions: Device: Hyperinflation with mechanical ventilator|Device: Manual hyperinflation
Outcome Measures: Interleukin 8 (IL-8)|Receptor for advanced glycation end products (RAGE)|Systolic blood pressure|Diastolic blood pressure|Heart rate|Mean arterial pressure|Respiratory rate|Dynamic compliance (cdyn)|Static compliance (cst)|Peak inspiratory pressure (PIP)|Plateau pressure (PP)|Airway resistance (Raw)
Sponsor/Collaborators: Hospital de Clinicas de Porto Alegre
Study Designs: Allocation: Randomized|Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment|Masking: Double (Participant, Care Provider)|Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
